message.body: How big was he at his last appt?
Rylans almost 21 now.... I had to take him in yesterday because he's had a runny nose and cough for a month, I had to get his lungs checked. He was fine,
most likely allergies :( boo! Does he have molars yet?
Coop has had a runny nose a lot too. Thought it might be teething but maybe allergies too. No coughing at least
And of course he hates to get it wiped
She said they are pretty young to already have allergies but he seems like it. I can give him benedryl and if that dries him up, it's most likely allergi
es. Which wouldn't be a surprise. I know got some reason it's torture to get your nose wiped....you'd rather have snot on your face?
